Muchly phase 2

23 Dec 2013

Language:

Ruby

Url:

http://secure-dusk-4761.herokuapp.com/

Currently still in development, this version of Muchly allows you to view your Twitter and Instagram timelines in one feed and also search for hastags across Twitter and Instagram.

Hi I'm Brent Parish, a passionate developer from Australia.

You can contact me at: hello@brentparish.com, follow me on twitter or see what I have been up to on github.
